resources.string: Kohler entered the power systems market in the early 1920s with the world\'s first engine-driven electrical generator powered by a KOHLER engine.This rugged unit delivered power to rural America prior to the advent of line electricity. Today, the Kohler Global Power Group is comprised of manufacturing facilities for engines and generators in four continents with worldwide sales, service and distribution networks and an arsenal of products and services engineered specifically to meet the demands of the markets they serve.Kohler Global Power Group is currently one of the largest diesel and gas generator manufacturing company known for its reliability, quality and innovative technology with products ranging from 3.5 kVA to 4200 kVA.Kohler Power India, commenced its India operation from 1997, operates from its headquarter at Pune, with branches at Delhi, Bangalore, Chennai and Kolkata. The India operation covers India, Nepal, Bhutan and Sri Lanka with extensive channel network and their outlets at almost all the major cities across the country.
